snippet.title: LostWinds - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
LostWinds is an enchanting adventure bursting with unique gameplay ideas that puts “the power of the wind in the palm of your hand”. Wield the awesome powers of Enril the wind spirit to guide and protect young Toku through this unique platform adventure. Experience all of the magic of Mistralis, a land full of wonder and intrigue that bursts to life with your every action and exploration.

Learn more at www.frontier.co.uk | Buy LostWinds http://store.steampowered.com/app/447780/LostWinds/
